description: This Dart source file defines the HomePage widget for a Flutter application called 'Memory Keeper'. It manages tab navigation between 'Notes' and 'Wallet' sections, persists the selected tab using SharedPreferences, and sets up placeholder views and filters for each section.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Main widget representing the application's home page with tab navigation for Notes and Wallet.

classes.name: _HomeTab
classes.description: Enumeration used internally to identify the two tabs: Notes and Wallet.

classes.name: _NotesTabView
classes.description: Stateless widget displaying filters and an empty state for the Notes section.

classes.name: _WalletTabView
classes.description: Stateless widget displaying filters and an empty state for the Wallet section.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state and loads persisted tab selection.

methods.name: _loadSelectedTab
methods.description: Loads stored tab index from SharedPreferences.

methods.name: _persistSelectedTab
methods.description: Stores the current tab index to SharedPreferences.

methods.name: _onItemTapped
methods.description: Handles tab switch events, updates state and persists selection.

methods.name: _buildFabForTab
methods.description: Returns the FloatingActionButton based on the current tab.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI tree, including Scaffold, AppBar, IndexedStack, and BottomNavigationBar.
